summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4087 for the improvement of Occidental Avenue, from King Street to Connecticut Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by retopping the existing brick pavement; under Ordinance No. 49119, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
